contact.summary:
"Why isn't my business thriving? 😒

I have a great product and a beautiful website.

I've tried all the marketing strategies out there.

I've applied every trick in the book, from SEO to social media campaign.

But nothing seems to work as expected.

What am I missing?" 🤔

If you find yourself asking these questions, you're not alone.

I'm here to solve your problem.

The truth is that marketing tactics alone aren't enough to make your business stand out.

You need a powerful Brand Story to cut through the noise.

A well crafted Brand Story; 

✅️ Captivates your target audience.
✅️ Creates an emotional connection.
✅️ Compels them to take action.

Break the mental barriers & build a bridge of connection leading to conversions.

But how to write a super captivating brand story? 

That's where I come in.

I'll craft compelling brand story that'll make your offers come alive in the hearts & minds of your customers.

𝐻𝑎𝑟𝑛𝑒𝑠𝑠𝑖𝑛𝑔 𝑡ℎ𝑒 𝑝𝑜𝑤𝑒𝑟 𝑜𝑓 𝑤𝑜𝑟𝑑𝑠 𝐼 𝑤𝑖𝑙𝑙 ℎ𝑒𝑙𝑝 𝑦𝑜𝑢𝑟 𝐵𝑈𝑆𝐼𝑁𝐸𝑆𝑆 𝑤𝑖𝑛 𝑡ℎ𝑒 𝑐𝑜𝑚𝑝𝑒𝑡𝑖𝑡𝑖𝑜𝑛 𝑎𝑛𝑑 𝑜𝑢𝑡𝑠ℎ𝑖𝑛𝑒.

Your vision + My Expertise = Blockbuster Brand Story.


Here's how we'll do it together;

⚡️DISCOVERY PHASE. Peeling the layers of your brand I'll uncover your unique selling point.

⚡️IDEATION PHASE, we do brainstorming sessions. Here creative concepts aligned with your brand's identity are born.

⚡️DEFINING THE KEY ELEMENTS of character, plot, conflict, and resolution to create your brand story. 

⚡️ ADD VISUAL ELEMENTS that enhance the storytelling experience.

⚡️ ITERATE and REFINE the story based on feedback.

⚡️MONITOR the performance of the story and make data-driven decisions for future strategies. 

And the outcome?

🎯 Your website will become a virtual stage that captivates visitors.

🎯 Your brand story will set you apart from competitors on all other platforms. 

🎯 Your business will experience tangible result. Improved sales, revenue & loyalty.


So, stop stressing and start Story-selling.

Let's create a story that propels your business to success!


👉🏼 Shoot me a DM… I'm excited to weave some magic into your brand story.


 amwordartist@gmail.com

profile_positions.description:
As Head of resourcing I am working collaboratively with the business units, COE’s, shared services and third party providers to deliver a 2 year transformation roadmap that delivers a best in class recruitment operation.
Across Early Careers, Contingent and Experienced hires, our recruitment operations deliver 7000+ hires pa across multiple business units in the defence industry.
Our transformation is focused on our Employer Brand, Technology, process and roles & responsibilities, and will ensure we delight our hiring managers and excite our candidates all underpinned by our Diversity and Inclusion agenda.
profile_positions.title: Head Of Resourcing

profile_positions.description:
As the consulting arm of Alexander Mann Solutions, Talent Collective’s global team of over 350 consultants have unrivalled expertise and heritage in the field of Talent Acquisition.

Consulting closely with you we provide strategic insights and tactical interventions on all elements of the Talent Acquisition process, including Talent Acquisition technology, branding & attraction, diversity, candidate experience, assessment and increasingly in the field of robotics.

Our purpose is simple – to partner with you to identify, develop and deliver the right solutions to enable you to succeed in competing for the best talent.
profile_positions.title: Senior Manager

profile_positions.description: Supporting the leadership team on assessing, refining and standardising the global recruitment process and approach based on capability, tools and people.
profile_positions.title: Global Talent Acquisition Program Leader

profile_positions.description:
Building successful stakeholder partnerships, and utilising strategic leadership skills I successfully delivered “best in class” talent acquisition within one of the most dynamic and varied businesses in the world.

I led a geographically disperse team of 30+ to execute our recruitment strategy across 9 different
industries for 3000+ vacancies a year. I delivered and continually flexed a strategy to a tight budget that spaned roles from high volume through to complex niche roles. Focusing on candidate experience and“employer branding” to attract and hire the best. I managed a blend of in house and RPO  (recruitment process outsourcing) resources; with agency usage below 5%.
profile_positions.title: Senior Talent Acquisition Director UK & Ireland

profile_positions.description:
I led and coached a team of in-house recruiters to fill over 1500 roles with the best talent 
across the UK and Ireland for Healthcare, Capital and Aviation businesses.  
I ensured our team delivered results in an uncertain environment, whilst maintaining best in
class candidate and customer satisfaction. 
Led Early Talent hiring across all of the UK.
profile_positions.title: Talent Acquisition Leader

profile_positions.description:
I developed and rolled out a centralized process utilizing internal IT systems across the 9 major
businesses in the UK for Intern and Graduate Hiring. 
Building relationships with key stakeholders and using change management tools ensured successful delivery to the businesses of 450 hires along with an improved candidate experience and enhanced employer brand. 
I managed the transition for the Aviation business of 400 + live vacancies from a master vendor model to an in-house GE UK recruitment center of excellence.
profile_positions.title: Senior Early Talent Acquisition Partner

profile_positions.description:
I managed the wing to wing recruitment process for Early Talent to deliver a strong pipeline into the business. 
Ensured best practice recruitment ideas were shared and implemented across other GE businesses. 
Led delivery of the UK HR council’s objective to provide a "One GE" approach to graduate recruitment in the UK. 
Co-lead of the Wales and Southwest GE Women's network.
profile_positions.title: Senior Recruitment Specialist - Early Talent

profile_positions.description:
I created a Diversity strategy proposal for the business. I researched external & internal best practice as well as benchmarking external / internal metrics. 
This was a short-term assignment to support my transition to HR.
profile_positions.title: Diversity Leader (Bubble assignment)

profile_positions.description:
I designed and implemented a gated review process using available technology for new product
development and manufacture across 10 sites in the UK and US. Stakeholder engagement and
strong change management skills ensured successful roll out and sustained use of the tool and
associated IT systems.
profile_positions.title: New Product Introduction Process Manager

profile_positions.description:
I led bidding activities to deliver innovative best in class product proposals and ensured continued
success of existing contract deliveries.
profile_positions.title: EADS Account Director

profile_positions.description: Partnered with global sites and production teams for all Airbus products to improve on time delivery from 50% to 100%.
profile_positions.title: Airbus Liason Manager

profile_positions.description: Responsible for all purchasing activities, supplier, and customer (Rolls-Royce) relationships associated with the JSF (Joint Strike Fighter) program.
profile_positions.title: JSF Supply Chain Manager

contact.summary:
Yes!! You can have it all!



Imagine effortlessly switching between drafting that groundbreaking proposal, managing your social media presence, and Emails are being responded to or not– all the while sipping your morning coffee in Hawaii

That’s the kind of life my clients have.

I help people who run their own businesses by creating a system that makes their work easier and more organized.

My ideal clients are independent business owners who are passionate about what they do but often feel overwhelmed by all the tasks they have to handle.

The main problem I solve for them is that they have too much administrative work and not enough time to focus on growing their business.

In a unique way, I design a personalized system for each client based on their specific needs. I use tools and software to automate repetitive tasks and keep everything well-organized. This way, they can manage their time better and focus on the most important parts of their business.

I provide ongoing support and make adjustments to the system as their business grows, so they always have an efficient way of working.

I believe that you can have it all – a thriving business and a joyful life – and I’ll help you achieve that balance

Let’s have fun and make money while at it, one project at a time.

Talk to ya soon!!

contact.summary:
Welcome, I’m Titi. 

I help b2b marketing agencies and tech publications like MedTechworld, Hackernoon, KeyScouts, and Marketing VLF create story-driven content that attracts, converts, and retains customers. 

A little about me: 

Marketing research has been my trusted ally. With it, I can preframe the target audience, connect and show them the true value of a product with words without sounding like that desperate salesman. Out of curiosity, I've also delved into the world of SEO and began seeing cool results—my client's content ranking first page of Google with higher organic traffic. 

Outside work, I live for humanity by engaging in social development activities. I anchor the ICT live program at Sweet Fm where we discuss emerging issues in tech with guests. Currently a fellow with the US Carrington Youth Fellowship initiative. Also volunteering with JAN, where I mentor over 30 students in leadership and entrepreneurship. 

So if you need a copywriter to craft persuasive stories without sleeping on deadlines, that’s me. DM and let’s talk about how to drive conversions for your business.

treasury_media.title: Protecting the healthcare system from cyberattacks

profile_positions.description: Generating and converting new leads to clients through copywriting. The business has to keep moving. Also creating story-driven SEO-optimized content for multiple brands like MedTechWorld, KeyScouts, Hackernoon, LeatherAdvice, and Marketing VLF. I've had to collaborate with both designers, and developers to execute marketing strategies, and it's been fun and hard work, of course. The fulfillment for me is watching my client's content get attention and more organic traffic that translates into ROI.
profile_positions.title: Conversion Copywriter

profile_positions.description: Journaling my journey as a copywriter and genuinely helping startups and techies with my content. Watch out for more to come.
profile_positions.title: Contributing Author

profile_positions.description: My first experience at a startup. Here, I got my hands dirty burying my head in research for 3 SaaS products. While it lasted, I wrote website copy, and social media copy that increased the company's following by 30% organically in 60 days under strict deadlines. Also crafted brand identities, refined brand messaging, and ensured consistency across channels.
profile_positions.title: Marketing Copywriter

profile_positions.description: I was one of Mootverse's first writers. Wrote creative SEO-optimized content that people found helpful. You can tell from the results—700 unique visitors monthly for a baby blog. The editor also loved my turnaround time and content quality.
profile_positions.title: Content Writer

Hi, I'm Ayushi 👋 - Your LinkedIn Growth Strategist and Content Writer for B2B SaaS and Marketing. 

As a content writer for B2B SaaS and Marketing, I will help you create compelling blog posts that bring traffic to your website. With my expertise in the industry, I will make sure to create content that keeps your audience engaged and persuade them to take the desired action. 

One of the blog posts I wrote for my client is ranking on the first page of Google. This is just an example. If you want to get similar results, we can hop on a free discovery call. 

And as your LinkedIn Growth Strategist, I will help you leverage your LinkedIn profile. Building a powerful personal brand gets you a trusted audience, establishes you as a thought leader, helps you hire great talents, and brings LEADS for your business. 

One of the top performing posts of my client got 40K+ impressions and brought him 4 leads.

Through creating content that elicits a response whether it be a conversation in the comments, a share to a friend, or a save to read up on later, you will build true brand equity and a loyal, engaged following. Canopy is the first incubated brand out of Doris Dev - a product development agency based in NYC and HK helping brands with ideation to creation and more. Clients include Great Jones, Magic Spoon Cereal, LoveSeen, and more. Canopy is a completely reimagined humidifier.

- Worked closely with the the Founders (Justin Seidenfeld + Lucas Lappe), Head of Marketing (Eric Neher), Head of CX (Michael DeSantis), and Graphic Designer (Nanjin Li) holding Social All-Hands calls to make sure all questions were answered and agendas were set 

- *December 2020* Beat growth goals for organic social MOM in 2020 through interest-based marketing tactics -> finished at 70% above plan

- Used given inventory strategically to maximize potential with influencers to expose Canopy to like-minded audiences, experts in the field through various activations (IGTVs, IG Takeovers, Giveaways)

- Spearheaded successful giveaways with brand partners such as Touchland, Verb Energy, and more

- Engaged valuable brand partners for collaborations focused on educating both audiences on important factors of skin health

- Effectively managed community and social CX to make sure all questions are answered and that Canopy is truly your skincare BFF

profile_positions.description:
The Flexible Foodie is an Instagram account that communicates an intuitive way of living where your diet works with your life, not the opposite way around. Thoughtful living, but still eating the foods you love or eating to reach whatever your goal may be.

After years of dealing with an eating disorder due to all the wrong nutritional information that existed, I sat in my college dorm room at UVM and made my Instagram account live and private with no intent of growth.  It acted as an accountability journal as I wanted to get better. I posted my dimly lit pictures of microwaved sweet potatoes and Quest protein bars every single day and found others who were in my shoes, but also was able to educate myself about what existed, which was another reason I fell in love with nutrition, dietetics, and human biology. I didn't make the account public for many years until I realized I accidentally pressed 'Post To Facebook'.

The Flexible Foodie is now on three platforms followed by almost 50,000 men & women filled with healthy good mood food recipes, looks into my life, and more. 

I have been featured in Delish, Everyday Health, V Magazine, InStyle and named as one of the 50 Influencers to Know at Expo East/West by New Hope Network.
 
I have and continue to work with brands on UGC ad campaigns and branded partnerships and now consult with CPG health + food brands when it comes to brand marketing, influencer marketing and content creation.

Partners + Collaborations have included: Hinge, Harmless Harvest, Hint, Snap Kitchen, La Colombe, Whisps, Maranatha, Premier Protein, Noosa Yoghurt, Pyure + many more
profile_positions.title: HIFC - Head Foodie In Charge

profile_positions.description:
While starting to freelance with restaurants while in school and working in retail, I came across O'Bagel - the #1 Bagel In NJ. Since first walking in, I knew I would become part of the family. Three years later, we have been featured in top food publications, on TV, ship nationwide, and are now about to enter the DTC market with a game changer product coming Early 2021.

As the Marketing Manager, I have:

- worked closely with Stephen El-Hassan, co-owner, to create content that get's exposed to our vast and loyal "O'Bagel Family" on our social platforms, mainly Instagram, Facebook, and Tiktok

- engaged with top food publications and shows that have led to features in Food Network, Man vs. Food, Delish, and more

- managed community and created content on O'Bagel's rapidly growing Instagram account while helping our Tiktok associate in managing community development on O'Bagel's Tiktok, which grew from 1K to 15K in 72 hours and significantly increasing nationwide sales
profile_positions.title: Marketing Manager

profile_positions.description:
After recommending a few switches to their content that resulted in a 750% increase in engagement within the first post, I was brought on to the team at Gregorys Coffee to handle and manage their omni-channel social media strategy ranging across Facebook, Twitter, and mainly Instagram. With this role, I was in charge of:

- creating, organizing, strategizing, and librarying content to be used on said channels and for any marketing collateral such as e-mail promotions, their Gregorys Coffee App, and/or website. Together with Kristin, Head of Marketing + Partnerships, we were able to kick Gregorys’ rebrand into action earlier than planned, engage deeper with the Gregular community through DR tactics and give structure to that side of the business through my custom graphic design, e-mail templates, and more (see in link attached) 

- managing and scaling all marketing initiatives including website, app downloads, digital acquisition, retail, SMS and social based on KPI goals

- working across multiple disciplines such as handling content creation (food photography, direct response creative, graphic design etc), influencer outreach, e-mail marketing, copywriting, and blogging

- Working closely with the leadership (Founder, CEO, CFO) to establish growth strategies for App Rewards ranging from speciality offers on drinks/food to celebrating holidays by bringing in a Valentine in exchange for a $1 drink which got sent to over 275,000+ people weekly
profile_positions.title: Social Media Manager and Strategist

- executed and strategized a plan for omni-channel social media strategy for Facebook, Instagram, and Facebook Ads

- worked closely with the founders to establish and strategize growth strategies for future product launches help support revenue goals

- relaunched and scaled the Vitauthority Affiliate Program that integrated with Shopify site and BrandChamp, an affiliate marketing platform

- in charge of cataloguing possible affiliates and handled all out-reach efforts and negotiations 

- scaled affiliate program by 3,150% in size within the first 30 days

 - 350% increase in affiliate sales in first 30 days

- led digital rebrand in creative direction and content for social media platforms

- 327% increase in engagement after rebranding social media channels in first 30 days

- worked closely with Head of Growth creating Facebook/Instagram Direct Response video & photo ad creative for launches such as their Daily Greens and Multi-Collagen Capules

Before consulting, I worked with the team to create a free recipe book highlighting Vitauthority's Multi-Collagen Protein. I was in charge of creative direction, recipe development, and content for the book. This book is given to anyone who purchases a tub of their MCP.  This book resulted in UGC content for the Vitauthority social channels as over 250,000 people have received a copy.

volunteer_experiences.description:
In 2013, I went on a service trip to Belize with 9 other students from my high school immediately after graduation. Through this program with my school, we were able to spend 10 days in Belize and help build a new home for an older woman who was living with her family that already did not have enough room for her. In 2 days, we were able to complete our task by giving her a house with a full bathroom and bedroom. 

For the rest of the trip, we spoke to the people in Belize City who told us about the culture and the hardships that they face. It is definitely a trip I will never forget as I hope to return soon.

contact.summary:
I am a teacher, trainer, content creator, editor, published poet, speaker, and recently, a podcast host. 

I have spent much of my life working with the English language. 

As the 𝗵𝗼𝘀𝘁 𝗼𝗳 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝘋𝘦𝘢𝘳 𝘔𝘺𝘯𝘥 𝗽𝗼𝗱𝗰𝗮𝘀𝘁, I use my storytelling skills to spark conversations about mental health in a safe and supportive space for listeners of all ages.

As a 𝘁𝗲𝗮𝗰𝗵𝗲𝗿 𝗮𝗻𝗱 𝘁𝗿𝗮𝗶𝗻𝗲𝗿, I have 24 years of experience teaching English, from verbal ability for competitive exams such as CAT, GRE, and GMAT to Shakespeare for post-graduate students of English Literature.

As a 𝗰𝗼𝗻𝘁𝗲𝗻𝘁 𝗰𝗿𝗲𝗮𝘁𝗼𝗿, I have worked with diverse clients, such as art stores, jewellery brands, hospitals, and organic products. These include: 
GreenTechMW, ISBACON22, Café Totaram, Roots Auto Products Private Limited, Your Once, Dimexon Jewellery Creation Private Limited, TiE University, The Amaya Store, Enzu Life, CDIIC, AOSRA-PM/AORA INDIA, House of India, USA, Sam Industries, Ganga Hospital, Sierra ODC, and Corona awareness booklets for a public safety campaign.

As an 𝗲𝗱𝗶𝘁𝗼𝗿, I have refined website content, fiction, poetry, short stories, speaker profiles, and spirituality books. 

I am also the 𝗰𝗼-𝗲𝗱𝗶𝘁𝗼𝗿 of 𝘛𝘩𝘦 𝘚𝘩𝘢𝘱𝘦 𝘰𝘧 𝘢 𝘗𝘰𝘦𝘮, the Red River Anthology of Contemporary Erotic Poetry.

As a poet, I have published two collections: 𝘛𝘩𝘦 𝘏𝘦𝘢𝘳𝘵 𝘪𝘴 𝘢𝘯 𝘈𝘵𝘵𝘪𝘤 and 𝘛𝘩𝘦 𝘉𝘭𝘶𝘦 𝘕𝘰𝘵𝘦. 
My poems have also appeared in several anthologies and journals, such as 𝘛𝘩𝘦 𝘙𝘦𝘥 𝘙𝘪𝘷𝘦𝘳 𝘉𝘰𝘰𝘬 𝘰𝘧 𝘗𝘰𝘦𝘵𝘳𝘺 𝘰𝘧 𝘋𝘪𝘴𝘴𝘦𝘯𝘵, 𝘛𝘩𝘦 𝘉𝘦𝘴𝘵 𝘐𝘯𝘥𝘪𝘢𝘯 𝘗𝘰𝘦𝘵𝘳𝘺, 𝘕𝘰𝘣𝘭𝘦/𝘎𝘢𝘴 𝘘𝘵𝘳𝘭𝘺, and 𝘌𝘵𝘩𝘰𝘴 𝘓𝘪𝘵𝘦𝘳𝘢𝘳𝘺 𝘑𝘰𝘶𝘳𝘯𝘢𝘭. 

My doctoral topic is '𝘛𝘩𝘦 𝘐𝘮𝘢𝘨𝘦𝘴 𝘰𝘧 𝘞𝘰𝘮𝘦𝘯 𝘪𝘯 𝘵𝘩𝘦 𝘕𝘰𝘷𝘦𝘭𝘴 𝘰𝘧 𝘚𝘢𝘭𝘮𝘢𝘯 𝘙𝘶𝘴𝘩𝘥𝘪𝘦.' 

It is based on the critic Catherine Cundy's claim that Rushdie resents women as a whole. She stated, "Rushdie’s self-appointed status as a champion of women in the face of religious, political and cultural constraints upon their freedom should not go unchallenged.” 

I successfully disproved the criticism, tracing the evolution of the characters from being almost passive background figures to coming into their own and changing the narrative of families and fates. 

I wrote a weekly column on poetry- 𝘙𝘶𝘯𝘯𝘪𝘯𝘨 𝘰𝘯 𝘗𝘰𝘦𝘵𝘳𝘺 for the Coimbatore MetroPlus Saturday edition from February 2014 to December 2015.

If you are interested in working with me or reading my work, do contact me. 

Thank you for visiting my profile.

contact.summary:
Hey there, I'm Dhaval – a digital expert and coding wizard. I am a creative soul who adores reading and is truly dedicated in all my efforts, which stands as the foundation of the growth and achievements of my career. My journey started with a Computer Engineering Diploma, but it was back in 2012 that coding truly captured my heart. The blend of curiosity, creativity, and hard work became my recipe for success.

Journey into the world of development and exploring different technologies, I had a big dream – to create my own empire. I was loaded with confidence and a burning desire to dive into the sea of learning. I kicked off freelancing in 2015, and that inner fire led me to reach new heights and fine-tune my skills.

The biggest challenge here was that the company used to be a trendsetter that pioneered impressive consumer spend solutions. My focus here was on bringing in modern operational processes, modern management philosophy and modern development and delivery mechanisms. A large part of this was improving the skillset of the team to handle the modern business market. A big win was implementing an innovation pipeline and driving delivery through agile and LEAN application.

profile_positions.description: Responsible for the full credit risk environment for both purchase cards and financial products (loans, budgets and HPs). This included owning the various technology systems used for product application, evaluating and re-designing the limit calculation model - both for scale and accuracy - and managing the relationship with Compuscan. Also managing the full collections environment right through to outsourcing and write-off. Served on company Audit & Risk Sub-committee.
profile_positions.title: Head of Credit Risk Operations

profile_positions.description:
Prodigy Finance provides student finance to individuals studying a post-graduate business or other specialist qualification at some of the top institutions in the world. Funding is acquired through both peer to peer investments and institutional investors with a focus on community and impact investments. 

The big problem to solve here was finding a way for students to pay their loans from anywhere in the world to the company headquarters in London, UK. We could not sit with a situation where failure to repay study loans was due to an inability to move funds to London in a consistent and affordable manner. These were not one off payments - loans were repaid for up to 72 months in some instances. So we had to solve both the functional challenge as well as normal collections challenges when someone simply could not afford to make payment. Which included finding an effective and affordable way to pursue payment across the globe. This process did not exist as international collections practices focus on large sums of money, not $50 000. But we developed a process that seemed to solve that problem - the first of its kind in the world. Prodigy - due to its business model - had quite a number of "firsts" to solve. A nod to Thomas Marsh and the Flywire team who really helped with a couple of those payment challenges.

contact.name: Danilo Navarro L.
contact.titleDescription:
You are all excited to embark on your very own business adventure as a solopreneur or small business owner. 

The time has finally come to create the jeweled crown of every online business. 
Your website 💎 

Then reality hits:

😬You are unclear on what is the main and most valuable message for your service.

😬You start typing out your offering but feel unsure if it sounds compelling.

😬The messaging feels “blah” and the user experience feels clunky.

The result? 

A website that reflects your own confusion 🤦‍♂️

It's frustrating, I know. 

You're busy growing your business, and you don't have time to become an expert in everything.

Unclear value propositions, clunky copy, and confusing user experience are the plagues of the solopreneur.

So why risk it and go at it alone? 

Here is the thing: 

when you have a sales-optimized website, not only do you attract customers, but you attract the right ones. 

Your traffic suddenly converts at a higher rate, customers trust your brand and want to come back for more. 
You start to see the real potential of your business. 

The way you always envisioned it.

Here is how we can help you skip the guesswork and turn traffic into sales:

-Sales copy and UX audit

We take an x-ray of your website and scan for errors. We give you a quick overview of the challenges and opportunities for improvements that will give you the biggest bang for your buck.

-Messaging and sales copy revamp

Know your customer. Understand their pains, dreams and desires. 
We help you take a peek at their thoughts and craft copy that talks to their hearts instead of their brains.

-Website makeover
Sometimes you just need a clean slate. Using UX-copy, messaging and proven CRO principles we help you create a stellar version of your website. 

Don't waste another minute.

We take the guesswork out of creating a website that sells, so you can focus on what you do best: running your business

Send me a DM and let's talk!

awards.description:
Gannett Fleming was honored in the Society for Marketing Professional Services’ 2014 Marketing Communications Awards for a coffee table booklet developed to celebrate the 2013 grand opening of the PHX Sky Train® project.

Gannett Fleming received the designation of third place in the book/monograph category. SMPS presented the award at its national conference on July 31, 2014, in San Antonio, Texas. This annual competition is the longest-standing awards program recognizing excellence in marketing and communications by firms in the architectural, engineering, and construction industries.

- See more at: http://www.gfnet.com/Newsroom/2014/NationalSMPSMarketingCommunicationsAwardHonorsGF090914.htm#sthash.QaCGPZwT.dpuf

awards.description:
A Gannett Fleming internal event developed to highlight the importance of safety on the job has been honored in the Society for Marketing Professional Services’ (SMPS) National Marketing Communications Awards program. The event, a personal protective equipment (PPE) fashion show, received the designation of second place in the internal communications category.

Amy Collins, CPSM, a deputy manager in the Corporate Communications & Marketing Section, and Paula Loht, CIH, corporate safety manager, both in the firm’s corporate headquarters in Harrisburg, Pa., developed the concept and managed the PPE fashion show. The event featured more than 35 employees dressed in PPE commonly used in the firm’s line of work free-climbing bridge inspections, environmental studies, traffic and transportation audits, water treatment plant design, and geotechnical engineering.

See more at: http://www.gfnet.com/Newsroom/2013/GFSafetyProgramEarnsNationalRecognition081413.htm#sthash.OyP4Cb4o.dpuf
awards.title: Second Place, Internal Communications Category
awards.issuer: Society for Marketing Professional Services’ (SMPS) National Marketing Communications Awards program

awards.description:
An article written for Gannett Fleming's corporate magazine, Forces of Change, has been honored in the Society for Marketing Professional Services' (SMPS) National Marketing Communications Awards program. Titled "FITTING IN Making Way for Transit Renewal," the article received the designation of second place in the feature writing category.

Written by Amy Collins, CPSM, a deputy manager in the Corporate Communications & Marketing Section in Harrisburg, Pa., the article featured the firm's work on the Hudson-Bergen Light Rail (HBLR) extension project in Hudson County, N.J. The challenges and unique solutions of the HBLR project were the primary emphasis of the article. As communities bolster public transit, many are faced with hurdles when finding a home for transit infrastructure in a developed area. The framework of the article brings these challenges to life and offers insight on how an urban community not served by public transit in 40 years was able to adapt the design of its new rail line to its existing infrastructure through creative engineering. The article appeared in the Winter 2011 issue of the magazine.

- See more at: http://www.gfnet.com/Newsroom/2012/HBLR072012.htm#sthash.FNyf4vBO.dpuf
awards.title: Second Place, Feature Writing Category
awards.issuer: Society for Marketing Professional Services’ (SMPS) National Marketing Communications Awards program

awards.description:
The International Association of Business Communicators’ (IABC) Harrisburg, Pa., chapter honored Gannett Fleming as part of its 24th Annual Capital Awards program. An international planning, design, and construction management firm, Gannett Fleming received a Gold Award in the Communication Management Division for Employee Communications for its workplace safety campaign.

See more: http://www.gfnet.com/Newsroom/2010/iabcawards112910.htm

contact.summary:
You’ve invested a lot of time and money into creating a product or service that solves a real problem for your customers. But you’re not getting the results you deserve. 

Why? Because your content is bland, boring, and forgettable.

Content is everything in today’s online world. It’s how you attract your ideal customers, how you showcase your value proposition, and how you convince them to buy from you. 

If your content is dull, generic, and uninspiring, you’re losing customers to your competitors who know how to create content that stands out.

Don’t let that happen to you.

I’m Ankita, a professional copywriter who specializes in B2B, SaaS, crypto, and digital marketing. I can help you create content that will:

• Attract your target audience and keep them hooked

• Highlight your unique features and benefits

• Encourage your prospects to take action and become customers

• Build trust and authority in your niche

• Boost your brand awareness and loyalty

Whether you need freelance content writing, ad and sales copy, social media posts, ghostwriting, blogging, emails, landing pages, long-form articles, or e-books, I’ve got you covered.

I have over 3 years of experience in writing for businesses in the B2B, SaaS, cryptocurrency, and digital marketing industries. I know how to write content that is engaging, informative, and conversion-focused.

So, what are you waiting for? Contact me today and let’s take your business to the next level with amazing content!

contact.summary:
Hey,
This is Tanvir Ahmed. I'm a skillful Digital Marketer, and Google Ads Specialist. 

I understand that every business wants to maximize its ROI through online advertising. However, not all businesses are equipped with the knowledge and expertise to create and manage successful Google Ads campaigns.

That's where I come in. With years of experience and a deep understanding of the Google Ads platform, I can help businesses of all sizes achieve their advertising goals.

Many businesses will create a campaign, set it up, and then let it run without ever revisiting it to see if it's performing at its best. This can lead to wasted ad spend and poor results.

Are you struggling to drive traffic to your website? Are your campaigns not delivering the results you hoped for? Or are you simply looking to take your Google Ads campaigns to the next level? Whatever the case may be, I can help.

My services include in-depth keyword research, ad copywriting, campaign creation, monitoring, and optimization. I work closely with clients to ensure that their campaigns are tailored to their specific needs and goals.

Performance matters! I monitor campaign data closely, making real-time adjustments to improve CTRs, reduce CPCs, and boost ROI. A/B testing is my secret weapon, enabling me to uncover winning variations that take your campaigns to the next level

profile_positions.description:
As a Google Ads specialist, my responsibilities encompass crafting and executing high-impact advertising campaigns. I conduct comprehensive keyword research, identifying strategic opportunities to maximize client ROI. Skillfully crafting compelling ad copy and designing captivating visuals, I engage audiences and drive clicks. By skillfully managing bids and budgets, I ensure optimal ad placements and cost-effectiveness.

Data analysis is central to my role, continually monitoring campaign performance to make data-driven decisions. I closely track conversions and implement precise tracking mechanisms to measure success accurately. Leveraging A/B testing, I optimize ads, landing pages, and targeting for improved performance.

Collaborating closely with clients, I understand their business objectives and tailor campaigns to meet specific goals. I communicate transparently, providing insightful reports and performance updates. Additionally, I stay current with industry trends and Google Ads updates, adopting best practices to deliver exceptional results.

As a dedicated Google Ads specialist, my focus is on driving targeted traffic, increasing brand visibility, and achieving optimal campaign outcomes for clients
profile_positions.title: Google Ads Specialist

profile_positions.description:
My approach to account management is highly strategic and data-driven. I conduct in-depth research and analysis to identify the most relevant and profitable keywords for each campaign, and I use my expertise to craft compelling ad copy that speaks to the target audience.

But my work doesn't stop there. I also take a proactive approach to account management, monitoring performance metrics and making data-driven adjustments to optimize each campaign for maximum results.

Whether it's adjusting bids, refining targeting, or optimizing ad copy, I am always looking for new ways to improve campaign performance and drive better results for my clients.

What sets me apart as a Google Ads account manager is my commitment to clear communication and collaboration. I work closely with each client to understand their unique needs and goals, and I provide regular reports and updates to ensure that they are always informed and engaged in the campaign process.

contact.titleDescription:
●	Consistently grew Luxury Skincare Brand revenue at a 125% Compound Annual Growth Rate, CAGR, on Amazon 3P FBA and Shopify in the US.

●	Achieved 25% Advertising Cost of Sales, ACoS, on ad spend of $3M.

●	Scaled customer base rapidly by 40% YoY via innovative A/B testing and PPC strategies.

●	Slashed 20% of costs on procurement spend of $4M by negotiating strategic contracts with B2B customers and implementing just-in-time, JIT, stock purchases from suppliers.

●	Delivered exceptional results by process improvement and lean thinking in merchandising, R&D, sales and operations management, customer relationship management (CRM), product management, online advertising, market research, Search Engine Marketing (SEM), and distribution to retailers.

●	Achieved a 25% spike in employee retention via teamwork culture transformation.

●	Devised and deployed a new digital customer acquisition strategy that propelled the lifetime value/customer acquisition cost (LTV:CAC) ratio to 8:1, >3x customers, and <5% churn rate.

●	Positioned eCommerce growth by conducting in-depth data analysis, driving continuous improvement, mitigating risk, and forging strategic Business to Business B2B partnerships.

●	Applied entrepreneurship mindset to grow revenue at 125% YoY by leveraging sound leadership across web analytics, global supply chain planning, business planning, digital strategy, sales management, email marketing, customer satisfaction, and user experience (UX).

contact.summary:
I lead online retail businesses to achieve recurring annual revenues of over $1 Million on Amazon & Shopify, because of my progressive experience of 14 years as a senior eCommerce executive. My leadership fuels:

- Profit-margin boosting supply chain strategies that enhance operations and customer satisfaction.
- Data-driven digital marketing strategies that optimize ROAS.
- Full utilization of Amazon's customer base through expert FBA strategies.
- Tailoring of Shopify platforms to expand online stores aligned with market trends.

Presently, I'm the Co-founder & CEO of Vijuve, a luxury skincare product manufacturer and retailer. Our tenfold growth (1,044.12%) in four years is powered by:

- Customer-focused online advertising strategies.
- Just-in-time supply chain management.
- High-performing teams led by my mentorship.
- Successful negotiation and acquisition of B2B retail partners.

Across varied industries like hair care, health & wellness, and skincare, I've managed $50M in revenue, $15M in procurement, and $5M in marketing, leading a team of 115 members.

Let's connect on LinkedIn to discuss how my eCommerce strategies and supply chain optimizations can elevate your online retail venture.

Vijuve is a Luxury Skin Care Brand providing innovative and revolutionary skin technology that delivers results you would expect from cosmetic procedures, right at home and for a fraction of the cost. 

Started up this brand in the USA with two Partners and successfully grew and established sales revenue from $0 to SMM in a period of 9-10 months. 

I believe such success results from building & leading world-class teams of Supply Chain, Sales, Marketing & Design which are actively involved and delivering exceptional results in various forms of R&D, Procurement, Marketing & Distribution. 

VIJUVE — Announce Your Uniqueness! 

●	Co-founded and leading Vijuve, achieving 1,044.12% 4-year growth and 125% CAGR on Amazon 3P FBA and Shopify in the US.

●	Managed $3M ad spend, securing a 25% Advertising Cost of Sales (ACoS).

●	Boosted customer base by 40% YoY through effective A/B testing and PPC campaigns.

●	Negotiated strategic contracts, cutting 20% off a $4M procurement spend via Just-in-time (JIT) stock purchases.

●	Streamlined operations in merchandising, R&D, sales, CRM, product management, advertising, market research, SEM, and distribution, driving efficiency.

●	Elevated employee retention by 25% through a culture of teamwork.

●	Implemented a digital acquisition strategy, increasing LTV:CAC ratio to 8:1, tripling customers with a <5% churn rate.

●	Guided eCommerce growth with thorough data analysis, risk mitigation, and strategic B2B partnerships.

●	Applied entrepreneurial approach, yielding 125% YoY revenue growth across analytics, supply chain planning, business planning, digital strategy, sales management, email marketing, customer satisfaction, and UX.
profile_positions.title: Co-Founder & Chief Executive Officer

profile_positions.description:
●	Launched 50+ Health & Wellness products across various e-commerce marketplaces.

●	Provided management consulting, forged, and nurtured new partnerships with Amazon Vendor while refining distribution channels, and expanded revenue by 30%.
profile_positions.title: Digital Sales Strategist as Consultant

profile_positions.description:
●	Expanded e-commerce sales revenue, of Professional Hair Care products, from $0 to $150k within 27 days, positioning the revenue for $3M+ per annum of repetitive business.

●	Became P&L owner and demonstrated business process re-engineering by mobilizing 50+ cross-functional team members while steering all aspects of Digital Marketing, Supply Chain (forecasting, logistics, inventory, and purchasing), Legal, HR, and B2B Sales Teams.

●	Boosted productivity by 100% of cross-functional teams, including Social Media Marketing, Content Creation (copywriters), SEO, Graphic Design, Development, and Video Editing.

●	Optimized Global Inventory and Sales performance on Amazon.com marketplace (USA) and Amazon Europe by driving FBA and Seller Fulfilled programs.

●	Built a skilled team of over 30 members by recruiting, coaching, and developing top industry talent by identifying key performance indicators.
profile_positions.title: Director of Growth

profile_positions.description:
●	Drove a 121% growth in social media likes and follower count via creative campaigns and tying strategy to execution.

●	Maximized online marketing ROI by 100% by improving communication with executive management, utilizing the budget wisely, and spending on the highest-impact channels. 

●	Identified and eliminated waste by up to 50% by modernizing Digital Marketing processes.

●	Initiated creative global digital sales and marketing strategies and user growth campaigns.
profile_positions.title: Head of Ecommerce & Operations

profile_positions.description:
●	Optimized end-to-end supply chain, reduced costs by 50% for a $5M procurement budget, and recruited and up-skilled talent by demonstrating sound leadership and analytical skills.

●	Boosted team productivity by 100% and slashed freight costs by 36% while centralizing shipment information and improving financial reporting substantially.

●	Slashed excessive inventory by 34% by introducing just-in-time stock purchases.

●	Drove a +50% increase in pick and pack efficiency, improved inventory storage, and enhanced space utilization by mapping out and implementing procedures for the US and EU warehouses.

●	Achieved 50% better Minimum Order quantity (MOQ), Production Times, and Delivery Terms from 20+ Chinese Suppliers, 10+ US Suppliers, and 5 European suppliers.
profile_positions.title: Head of Supply Chain Management

profile_positions.description:
●	Managed a $6.30M budget and spearheaded all aspects of the Procurement and Supply Chain department.

●	Enhanced product conformity by 36% by enforcing supplier performance against company standards. 

●	Led thorough research to discover global manufacturing vendors offering top-quality products 70% cheaper.

●	Handled 3PL with freight forwarders, monitored and improved performance by up to 50%, and negotiated prices to reduce freight costs by 40%.
profile_positions.title: Supply Chain Manager

profile_positions.description:
●	Directed procurement and supply chain optimization while managing up to a $0.5M budget.

●	Engaged closely with key stakeholders, including suppliers, customers, directors, and other team members, ensuring perfect collaboration for successful project completion.

●	Improved relationships with existing suppliers and proactively sought new suppliers globally.
profile_positions.title: Executive Engineer

zFull.summary:
I lead online retail businesses to achieve recurring annual revenues of over $1 Million on Amazon & Shopify, because of my progressive experience of 14 years as a senior eCommerce executive. My leadership fuels:

- Profit-margin boosting supply chain strategies that enhance operations and customer satisfaction.
- Data-driven digital marketing strategies that optimize ROAS.
- Full utilization of Amazon's customer base through expert FBA strategies.
- Tailoring of Shopify platforms to expand online stores aligned with market trends.

Presently, I'm the Co-founder & CEO of Vijuve, a luxury skincare product manufacturer and retailer. Our tenfold growth (1,044.12%) in four years is powered by:

- Customer-focused online advertising strategies.
- Just-in-time supply chain management.
- High-performing teams led by my mentorship.
- Successful negotiation and acquisition of B2B retail partners.

Across varied industries like hair care, health & wellness, and skincare, I've managed $50M in revenue, $15M in procurement, and $5M in marketing, leading a team of 115 members.

Let's connect on LinkedIn to discuss how my eCommerce strategies and supply chain optimizations can elevate your online retail venture.
zFull.sub_title: Co-Founder & CEO Vijuve: Built $MM online retail business // Leading retail brands to become Amazon & Shopify best-sellers without losing profit margins - because of supply chain, operations, and marketing strategies.

contact.summary:
With many years of experience in cyber-security, I have gained various experiences in:

- Responsible  to research the latest information technology security trends, best practices, threats, and potential vulnerabilities, participating in developing security standards and best practices appropriate for clients and recommending security enhancements to Security team leadership
- Be involved in full cycles of designing, building, fine-tuning and improving security detection and response capabilities understanding threat actors’ TTP; use data analytics, define and implement new tooling and collaborate with stakeholders to improve response actions in a large cyber defence SOC environment, with a focus on SIEM content.
- Be part of the security engineering team of the SOC –  a diverse, international team, with an Agile/DevOps approach and cross-skilled experience and knowledge, providing a secure environment and enabling the Security Operations analysts, incident responders and threat hunters to better defend the organization and its assets, and better respond to threats.
- Optimize best data collection and analysis, acting on data and reporting utilizing SIEM and SOAR approach and tools to optimize and automate for efficient resource management, proper use case/model build-up and fine-tuning and overall intelligent detection linked to the threat model and business realities within the global business environment you are defending.
- Contribute to securing both internal networks/infrastructure and cloud (Azure, AWS, GCP) infrastructure and the relevant applications, enabling better monitoring and detection by utilizing large amounts of data and modern detection techniques.
- The role focuses on content development (taking user stories and developing use cases, updating and optimizing current use cases/sources / SIEM connectors etc.) using sources from the cloud and hybrid infrastructure.
- Add value to multiple security projects in a multi-disciplinary team setup, advise and hands-on contribute to getting things done.
- Stay on top of ongoing security threats and overall developments in the security landscape linked to the organization’s threat model, and bring from an engineering perspective insight on how to leverage new methodologies, tools and optimizations and practically implement these.

education.degree_name: Masters of Science in Cyber Security and Information Assurance (MSCS)

treasury_media.description: When you have a good understanding of your visibility, detection coverage and which ATT&CK techniques are relevant for your organization (based on threat intelligence), you can start to identify gaps and improvements to prioritize your blue team’s defence efforts.
treasury_media.title: IDENTIFY GAPS AND PRIORITISE BY  MITRE ATT&CK™ framework

profile_positions.description:
 Stay up to date on the latest trends, best practices, and potential vulnerabilities in IT security and participate in developing standards and best practices appropriate for clients. Recommend security enhancements to Security team leadership.
 Develop detection use cases in SOC tooling to alert SOC analysts to relevant threats, test existing detection analytics, validate detection resiliency, and identify gaps in visibility.
 Fine-tune SIEM correlation searches and other security tooling to improve accuracy and minimize false positives.
 Design and implement a custom MITRE framework for clients, enabling the SOC to detect and counter sophisticated attacks. Use threat collection to monitor domains and key individuals in our client’s environment and alert on credential leaks and data dumps.
 Develop a custom MITRE heat map to track the most common adversary techniques and prioritize use case development.
 Build dashboards, reports, and other content to optimize the team's ability to investigate and respond to alerts
profile_positions.title: MSS Detection & Content Engineer

profile_positions.description:
 Create and organize security dashboards, correlation rules, use cases, and reports to effectively triage potential threats.
 Categorize, detect, and investigate security threats, and determine appropriate strategies for containment, remediation, and recovery. 
 Conduct proactive "Threat Hunting" to identify potential threats before they can cause harm.
 Monitor systems to detect and respond to critical attacks such as zero-day and advanced persistent threats (APTs).
 Develop and enhance Splunk operational capabilities by building correlation rules, dashboards, and analysis logs, and generating reports based on identified threats and intrusions.
 Assist with implementing countermeasures and mitigating controls as part of an Incident Response Team.
 Manage and respond to alerts from various monitoring systems and platforms in a timely and effective manner.
profile_positions.title: Threat Hunting

profile_positions.description:
 Develop and implement threat models and application risk profiles using frameworks such as Cyber Kill Chain, MITRE ATT&CK, NIST, and SANS to identify potential security threats. 
 Perform incident response, including incident detection, containment, evidence collection, recovery, and report preparation. 
 Analyze relevant information and intelligence to identify potential threats to critical systems, infrastructure, and resources. 
 Contribute to the development of the cybersecurity roadmap and communicate it to other department leaders. 
 Lead the response and escalation of security events identified through various sources and technologies, as well as internal Help Desk notifications. 
 Ensure secure configuration and operation of IT systems through maintenance of up-to-date baselines, whether they are under direct control or not. 
 Continuously improve SIEM tooling throughout the organization by driving a strategy, auditing, and tuning applications, and periodically reviewing rules that generate true positive events. Automate identification, response, and remediation of malicious activity.
 Assist manager in creating cyber security governance and compliance strategies and roadmaps.
profile_positions.title: Sr.Threat Detection | Hunting

profile_positions.description:
 Develop and implement initiatives to improve incident response capabilities and speed of remediation.
 Possess expert knowledge in security incident management, malware management, and vulnerability management processes.
 Conduct vulnerability assessments and assign necessary solutions to teams to cover PCI DSS requirements.
 Manage the entire use case lifecycle, including development, tuning, and deployment, to detect suspicious activities within the organization.
 Assist in the evaluation, classification, and remediation of vulnerabilities identified within Al-Rajhi Bank.
 Coordinate, facilitate, and manage vulnerability tickets to reduce enterprise vulnerabilities.
 Stay up to date with the latest IT security trends, best practices, threats, and potential vulnerabilities, and participate in developing security standards and best practices appropriate for the enterprise.
 Investigate intrusion attempts and perform in-depth analyses of exploits by correlating various sources and determining which systems or data sets are affected.
 Lead and support cross-functional collaboration for security incident response to efficiently resolve security events.
profile_positions.title: Cyber Security Analyst

profile_positions.description:
	Monitored security events and threats as part of a 24x7x365 Risk Operations Centre.
	Led technical investigations of security incidents as a key incident responder for the Risk Operations Center.
	Conducted in-depth analyses of security incidents to identify incidents and/or indicators of compromise.
	Performed intrusion scope and root cause analyses and assisted with intrusion remediation, containment, eradication, and recovery.
	Integrated SIEM with network devices, security devices, applications, databases, and OS.
	Upgraded SIEM components from any version to the latest version.
	Successfully implemented many SIEM projects, including installation, configuration, integration of network and security devices, and final documentation.
	Performed administrative and configurational tasks of deployed security tools.
	Possessed a strong foundation in networking fundamentals with a deeper knowledge of TCP/IP and other core protocols.
	Conducted deep packet inspection using standard tools such as Wireshark, Tshark, tcpdump, Ngrep, Network Miner, etc.
	Ensured system and data security, monitored compliance with established security protocols, identified and investigated security misuse/protocol breaches, and provided updates and recommendations to management on the resolution of issues.
profile_positions.title: Cyber Security Analyst

contact.summary:
4x founder. 13+ years of experience in business development, international expansion, product development, and operations for startups and global brands, especially in the tech, transportation, and financial services (fintech) industries. Extensive track record leading companies and many areas of the tech space, including initial strategy, design, development, sales, marketing, risk, fraud, compliance, customer service, ongoing maintenance, operations, and end of life. 

Passionate about building products and services that drive economic growth. Native English and Spanish speaker. Former athlete. 

Experience:
- Building, leading and growing local and globally-distributed teams of ~50 people to execute the full product delivery cycle, from initial strategy/design all the way through implementation, operation, and continuous improvement. 
- Establishing and developing long-term strategic relationships with all sorts of organizations, including financial institutions, government entities, and private companies across multiple regions and at all levels, including executive/C-suite.
- Hands-on experience and proficiency guiding design, data science, engineering, operations, security, compliance, legal, and quality teams through high-complexity, high-uncertainty projects with great results. 
- Particular experience in payment facilitation models including overall solution strategy, design, data management, merchant relations, onboarding, relations with financial institutions, banks, acquirers, payment hardware, compliance, risk management, marketing, legal, and operations.
- Ample experience directing technology projects for businesses of all sizes including high-visibility brands such as Coca-Cola, Rio 2016 Olympic Games, Lifetime Fitness, government entities, universities, as well as multiple airports around the world. 

Specialties: Team leadership, partnerships, fintech, startups, strategic planning, product management, operations, risk, fraud, AML, compliance, cybersecurity, data science, service design, hardware design, UX/UI, customer experience, customer service, business development, pricing, PCI, AWS, payments, video production, process improvement, contract negotiation, native English and Spanish speaker.

contact.summary:
As a daily challenger of the status quo, I learn best by taking action with a strategic, yet rebellious mindset...



Through grit, learning my strengths, and knowing where I add the most value as I continue to build my brand, I intentionally invest in mastering the key fundamentals needed to generate more ROI through establishing long-term relationships - striving to bring relevant solutions with an omni-channel presence. 

Whether I am winning or learning by doing, I am growing. And with growth I believe more opportunities, wins, losses, in all fashions, will be presented - but ultimately, the knowledge of becoming the person I tell myself I will be, both professionally and personally will be in full reach. 

— 

Atlanta native, Tampa living with my 2 precious daughters, a former Ole Miss Rebels basketball player — thriving with an “I will make it happen” mindset and focusing on “1 stair at a time, not the whole staircase.”

I am extremely competitive against myself. I am a passionate, results-driven opportunist. I embrace change and adapt. I am a self-motivated team player. I believe that authenticity and transparency win. I am a risk taker through and through, knowing that risks become one of two things; rewards or lessons. 

Highly skilled in the art of communication, driving trusted relationships, brand awareness, dark funnel revenue creation, content marketing, community-led growth, influencer marketing, social networking, driving ideas to conception, and all in all- Evangelism- being my absolute passion…helping others first and foremost.

I specialize in living between sales and marketing, driving and creating demand while capturing it, as I meet executives where they "live" while testing unique strategies and techniques based on market trends, leveraged by EQ + IQ combined - knowing both are wildly important for overall success. 

---

Conversations are always open on my end whether it’s to be a soundboard, champ or full-on resource for you- 
let’s chat.

▪️ameliataylor.content@gmail.com

contact.summary:
If you are a Business Owner, then you probably want to find and target high-quality leads and convert them to clients on autopilot by using a proven system, so you can focus on predictable growth in your company.

I started my career very early on when I was in my 10th standard vacation, by selling construction chemicals and the journey has taken me so far over here, where I am still traveling with a lot of attention, discipline & commitment. 

Today I work as a Performance Marketing Specialist; Content Creator; & Helping businesses and personal brands grow with the vertical of Marketing. Having taught more than 30,000+ students in direct marketing and digital marketing. 

In the last 4 years of my performance marketing journey I have specialized into:

✓ Increasing the number of high-quality leads & sales for the businesses up to 200%-300% in a matter of 45 - 60 days.

✓ Drive targeted, quality audiences from Linkedin, Facebook, and Google Ads which resulted in hundreds of thousands of dollars in sales.

To be frank I have failed in multiple businesses and lost a lot of money in different ventures. To be specific 1 Million INR, but earned limitless knowledge with which I have been able to cope.

Hi, I am Anupam - I am a Trainer for Stock Market, Mutual Funds & Financial Planning. 

Trained 10,000+ investors:

    - Recommendations: 100+ on this profile

It has been 16+ years since I am helping people with investment strategies.

License & Certification: 
     - SEBI Registered Research Analyst  
     - Certified Financial Planner (CFP) 
     - Independent Director's Database Registration 
       (Indian Institute of Corporate Affairs)

I grew up seeing my father reading annual reports, journals, and business newspapers. He started investing way back in 1978. And this is where my investment journey started.

Subconsciously, I was learning about markets, investments, compounding, etc. from my father.

The best decision of my life - I started investing from my very first paycheck, in 2006.

Stock investments made me & my family financially free and this is one of the major reasons I am in this field.

I love doing Stocks & Mutual Fund Analysis and it makes me happy to share my learning with investors. 

That's why I took it as my profession.

I help investors bring stability to their financial lives through equity investments.

I can help you with investments, message me here or email me at info@anupamroongta.com

We believe in long-term investments (minimum 5 years horizon) and are highly influenced by the investment principles of Benjamin Graham, Warren Buffett, Philip Fisher, and Peter Lynch. 

To create wealth, starting early in life, and doing a long-term investment is more important than the amount of investment. 

Feliz believes that integrity and knowledge are the two pillars on which it has built its base in this industry. The fact that it has 5000+ satisfied Investors today is a testimony to its integrity and the professionalism with which it deals with its Investors.

contact.summary:
Are you tired of constantly worrying about where your next client will come from? 👀

Do you find yourself wasting thousands of dollars on marketing and cold messaging just to convert a single lead? 

If so, your brand positioning is likely weak, and your prospects aren't confident that you can solve their problems. 

But imagine if your brand was seen as an authority in your industry. Clients would be reaching out to you daily, and you'd be in a position of power. This is what I can help you achieve. 😉

You might ask, how do you do this, Anushka? Here's a sneak peek of my process. 👇

1️⃣ Audit your current brand: We'll start by deep diving into your current personal brand, examining everything from your messaging to your visual content to ensure it's consistent with your target audience.

2️⃣ Develop a content strategy: Once we understand your brand, we'll develop a content strategy that resonates with your target audience. We'll create engaging and informative content that speaks to your target audience, positions you as an authority, and drives leads to your business.

3️⃣ Publish high-quality content: We will create and publish high-quality content for your personal brand that resonates with your target audience, resulting in increased engagement and daily business enquires.

4️⃣ Engage with your audience: We will engage with your audience, responding to comments and messages, nurturing relationships, and driving leads to your business.

5️⃣ Monitor and optimize: We'll monitor your brand's performance, optimize the content strategy, and make changes where necessary to ensure continued success.

And the best part? There's no risk involved. If you don't see results, I will work for free until you do. 

So if you're serious about building your brand online and attracting more clients, let's make it happen.

Shoot me a DM or email me at rathore.aanushka@gmail.com 🚀

profile_positions.description:
I have worked with over 25 clients across various industries, including B2B, DTC, SaaS, and marketing. My role involves developing and implementing social media strategies to increase engagement, drive traffic to client websites, create high-quality content, and manage online communities.

One of my key strengths is my ability to develop effective social media strategies that align with each client's business goals and target audience. I take a data-driven approach to social media management. I use analytics tools to track performance and make informed content and engagement tactics decisions.

In addition to strategy development, I am highly skilled in strategy implementation, ensuring that each campaign is executed flawlessly and on schedule. I am proficient in using various social media management tools, including Hootsuite, Sprout Social, and Buffer, to schedule and publish content, monitor engagement, and track performance metrics.

My experience working with clients from various industries has given me a deep understanding of each industry's nuances and best practices, allowing me to tailor my strategies to maximize results. I have worked with clients to create successful social media campaigns that have increased brand awareness, driven website traffic, and generated leads and sales.

If you're looking for a social media specialist to help take your online presence to the next level, I'm here to help. With my experience working with a diverse range of clients and industries, and my expertise in developing and implementing effective social media strategies, I am confident that I can help you achieve your business goals through social media. 

Whether you want to increase brand awareness, drive website traffic, or generate leads and sales, I have the skills and knowledge to create a custom social media plan to deliver results. Let's work together to take your social media game to the next level!
profile_positions.title: Social Media Marketing Specialist

profile_positions.description:
As a Copywriter and Content Writer at Unsweetened Beauty, I created and executed the company's content strategy across various platforms, including LinkedIn and Instagram. My role involved developing compelling copy and content that resonated with our target audience and effectively communicated the brand's message and value proposition.

In addition to creating content, I also served as a social media strategist, developing and executing social media campaigns to increase brand awareness, engagement, and follower growth. I leveraged my strong writing skills to craft engaging and on-brand social media posts and captions that helped to increase our social media following and drive traffic to our website.

Throughout my tenure at Unsweetened Beauty, I became a versatile and creative writer with a deep understanding of social media best practices. I demonstrated a keen ability to write in various styles and tones, tailoring my writing to suit the needs of different platforms and audiences. My contributions helped elevate the brand's content and social media presence, increasing brand recognition and customer loyalty.
profile_positions.title: Copywriter

profile_positions.description:
As a Social Media Marketing Specialist at Hubler, I managed and executed the company's social media marketing campaigns across various platforms, including LinkedIn and Instagram. My responsibilities included creating and curating engaging content, developing and implementing social media strategies, and analyzing data to measure the effectiveness of our campaigns.

I collaborated closely with the marketing team to ensure our social media efforts aligned with our overall marketing objectives. Through my efforts, I helped increase our social media following and engagement and contributed to significant growth in website traffic and lead generation.
profile_positions.title: Social Media Marketing Specialist

profile_positions.description:
As the Social Media Marketing Intern at Pahel Foundation, I managed the organization's social media presence and worked with a team of 10+ interns to increase followers and reach. My role involved developing and implementing content calendars and strategies to market the organization's cause.

One of my key responsibilities was ensuring that the interns could adapt to new technologies and strategies to improve their social media management skills. I helped the interns develop their skills and increase their engagement rates while also managing the overall social media presence of the Pahel Foundation.

My experience as a social media marketing specialist at Pahel Foundation allowed me to develop skills in team leadership, content planning, and technology adaptation. I could effectively manage and coordinate multiple tasks and projects while collaborating with team members to enhance performance and achieve goals.
profile_positions.title: Social Media Marketing Intern

profile_positions.description:
During my 1.6-year internship at Stumagz as a Copywriter, I developed a passion for content creation, social media marketing, and personal branding. My role at Stumagz involved writing articles and marketing copy. 

As I became more experienced in content creation, I began to focus more on social media marketing, creating content calendars that drove high levels of engagement. I also developed skills in writing captions and using hashtags to attract followers to Stumagz's social media accounts.

I developed valuable content creation, copywriting, and social media marketing skills, which have become key components of my professional skillset. 

My experience as a Copywriter Intern at Stumagz provided me with a solid foundation in content creation and social media marketing, as well as an understanding of branding and how to use it to promote oneself and a company.
profile_positions.title: Copywriting Intern

profile_positions.description:
During my 2-month internship at Shortfundly, I had the opportunity to work on various projects and gained experience in various aspects of human resources management. As an HR Intern, I managed various tasks, including team management, content creation, designing, and social media management.

Through this internship, I developed adaptability and quick learning skills, as I was required to take on new responsibilities and learn new skills quickly. I could effectively manage and coordinate multiple tasks and projects, demonstrating strong leadership skills. Additionally, I learned how to work collaboratively with team members to achieve goals, improve processes, and enhance team performance.

As an HR Intern at Shortfundly, I created and executed content and design strategies aligned with the company's overall goals. I also managed Shortfundly's social media accounts, using my content creation and management skills to increase engagement and build brand awareness.

Overall, my experience as an HR Intern at Shortfundly helped me develop valuable skills in adaptability, quick learning, and leadership. It also allowed me to gain experience in various HR functions, including content creation and social media management.
profile_positions.title: Marketing Intern

contact.summary:
🟡 Struggle to get clients and time to be an authority on LinkedIn?

Here is how you can have a better life by unleashing your thought leadership, being an authority, and getting clients 👇


In the past, I dedicated myself to improving the quality and productivity of companies with annual revenue of +25M USD through management systems, and I also worked on communications and marketing projects to increase sales and achieve ROIs of 4X.

In 2021, I started a completely different business, where I learned everything I needed to do, from cleaning and cooking to making deliveries. Despite having over 100 virtual restaurant brands, I failed.

Finally, I decided to revive a social selling and marketing project called STAMINA 4X, which means energy and tenacity to complete any task and succeed in what one sets out to do.

From here comes the SALES 4X model, in which we use our expertise in LinkedIn applying Social Selling, Copywriting, Ghostwriting, Outbound Marketing, sales strategies, and the use of Sales Navigator.


🟡 What you get working with me and the SALES 4X method:

contact.summary:
I graduated from college in 2004. I had no idea what I wanted to do.

I landed a job at a startup medical device company.

I started in marketing. Two years later I was promoted to sales. 

High pay. Flexible schedule. Startup culture. Stock options. I loved it! 

My job required 30+ hours a week of car travel. I used ALL of that time to educate myself about the stock market.

I binge listening to every audiobook, podcast, and earnings call I could find. I studied financial statements. I constantly communicated with other investors. 

I learned 100x more about business, money, and investing in my car than I did in college. 

By 2014, I realized that my true calling in life was to become a financial educator. I LOVE everything about investing -- especially helping other people figure out how the stock market works.

In 2015, I got lucky. A new management team took over, and I was let go. That career shock pushed me to apply for my dream job at The Motley Fool.

I got the job and became a full-time writer in 2015. 

At the start, I was a terrible writer. Gradually, I improved. Over time, I was invited to work on premium articles and become a recurring guest on podcasts and live streams.

In 2019, I started sharing investing lessons on Twitter. That decision changed my life. I've grown my following to more than 400,000 in under 3 years. 

I also started writing a book.

In 2021, I started a YouTube channel. That proved to be another transformative decision. I've grown my subscriber base to more than 60,000+ in just over 1 year.

In 2022, I launched my book. It's called "Why does the stock market go up?" It's the book I wish I had when I first started investing. It's on pace to become a best-seller.

My career mission is "to spread financial wellness."

I now spend my time creating content that helps people manage their personal finances, invest better, and think long-term.

99% of the content that I make is free to consume. 
In 2022, I launched a course with my business partner Brian Stoffel:

FINANCIAL STATEMENTS EXPLAINED SIMPLY

This two-week book camp takes people from rookies to financial analysts. We explain the balance sheet, income statement, and cash flow statement in plain English. It's an ideal course for investors, business owners, and managers who want to level up their business skills.

-> LEARN MORE: www.maven.com/brian-feroldi/

Email: brian@brianferoldi.com
Twitter: @brianferoldi
Instagram: @brianferoldi

contact.companyPosition: Private Wealth Advisor, Senior Vice President - Wealth Management
contact.summary:
Continuum Wealth Advisors
UBS Private Wealth Management
https://advisors.ubs.com/continuum/

At Continuum Wealth Advisors, we help successful founders, entrepreneurs,  and C-level executives maximize the impact their wealth can have on their life, on the ones they love and the causes they care about.

Wealth management is not just a one-time event but a continuous journey that evolves over time. Our clients' financial needs and goals change as they move through different stages in their lives, and we are committed to providing comprehensive and personalized advice that meets those evolving needs.  

By embracing the concept of a wealth continuum, we aim to create a partnership with our clients that lasts a lifetime. Our goal is to help you navigate the challenges and opportunities of your financial journey, from the accumulation of wealth to its preservation and transfer to future generations.  

We realize that wealth is more than just dollars and cents. This is why we consider your overall financial life to understand how the decisions made to address current circumstances may impact your individual goals and values for you and your family.  

Connecting you to the expansive global resources and insight of Private Wealth Management of UBS, we’ve never been better positioned to help our clients with significant wealth pursue their most important goals – from maximizing the value of their business to making a meaningful philanthropic impact to leaving a lasting family legacy for generations to come.
/*********/
**These are the comments of this employee only, and not of UBS Financial Services Inc., its subsidiaries or affiliates. No instructions for business transactions or which affect any client's accounts will be accepted through LinkedIn. Communications may be monitored and retained by UBS. All information and comments are provided for current, informational purposes only. See http://www.ubs.com/fas-legal for the full disclosure.**

profile_positions.description:
I am fortunate to co-lead a team that helps founders, entrepreneurs, executives, and affluent families managed the complexity that comes with significant wealth.  Wealth goes far beyond just dollars and cents, but can be a powerful tool to make a positive impact on your life, your family, and the causes you care about.  All of our clients have unique backgrounds and stories, but all have a similar passion to maximize the impact their wealth can create.

We look at the big picture of our client’s advanced planning needs—including tax and estate planning, investment management, asset protection, philanthropy and preparing their heirs for an eventual inheritance.  Simply put, we want to create an advanced plan that preserves your wealth and deepens the impact for future generations.  Clients say when they leave the planning to us, they can focus on what they value most.

I began my wealth management career more than two decades ago at Merrill Lynch and joined UBS in 2009.  I have earned the Certified Exit Planning Advisor® designation; the Series 7, 31 and 66 securities licenses; Life, Disability and Long-Term Care Insurance licenses in order to better serve our clients.  I hold a B.A. in Business Administration, Finance from San Diego State University (Go Aztecs!), where I was a member of the SDSU crew team.  This experience taught me the values of hard work and dedication which I strive to bring to my clients each and every day.

I live in San Diego with my wife, Amber. We are the proud parents of two children, Mia and Riley, and two dogs Murphy and Ivy.  Outside of the office, I enjoy golfing, reading, traveling and spending time with my family.  I care deeply about my community.  Ronald McDonald House and breast cancer research are causes that are important to me.
