contact.summary:
THE LEADER IN THE DESIGN AND MANUFACTURE OF CONSERVATORY ROOFING SYSTEMS
Ultraframe was established with one simple goal: to be the go-to name for beautifully crafted, cutting-edge roofing systems. And, having been in the industry for over 30 years and with over 2,000,000 Ultraframe roofs installed in the UK, we're proud of what we've achieved.

But, just like the technology we use to construct our roofs, we don't stand still. To ensure we stay as one of the most trusted names in the industry, we not only test our products in our own laboratory and test facilities, we also use independent third-party accreditation and testing agencies, such as Wintech and the British Board of Agrément (BBA). In fact, the majority of Ultraframe conservatory roofing systems carries a 25-year BBA life-expectancy certificate.

contact.companyPosition: Chairman of the Sleep Better Live Better Foundation
contact.summary:
I'm a Registered Nutritionist (MSc, ANutr) and Functional Medicine Certified Health Coach (FMCHC) with extensive educational, research and clinical experience in the fields of nutrition, psychology, stress management, sleep and circadian science, health education and behaviour change.

But my life wasn't always this way...

As a teenager, I suffered from severe mental and physical health challenges because of an addiction to artificially lit technology devices.

Due to only achieving between 5 to 6 hours of sleep each night on average, from the age of 13 to 16 I gained over 4 stone in weight and began to experience severe anxiety, depression, suicidality and losses in self-confidence and self-esteem. 

I wasn't able to maintain school attendance or remain focused, concentrated and engaged enough to perform well during the most important years of my schooling.

Over a 10-year journey that uncovered the answers to my own health challenges, I completed degrees in Psychology and Nutrition, as well as studies in Functional Medicine.

In 2018, after suffering from a period of personal and professional burnout, I once again lost touch with the magic of deep sleep and found myself struggling in all areas of life.

This was another pivotal period of life during which I dove deep into the science of sleep and learned about the emerging scientific fields of circadian health, light, mind-body medicine, electromagnetism and quantum biology.

Merging this with my previous education formed a comprehensive understanding of how best to optimise my sleep in the modern world.

This defined my life and career path...

In 2020, I founded Sleep Better Live Better as a platform to combine my decade-long studies, experience and passion for the betterment of human health by improving awareness and providing education and tools that can support businesses and schools to unlock their true human potential through deeper rest.

In 2021, I registered our charitable foundation with the aim to address core issues affecting children’s and adolescents’ sleep through the promotion of research-backed education and other interventions that can positively impact growth, development and overall well-being.

My mission is to touch the lives of 1,000,000 adults and children by bettering their sleep.

Right now I'm training individuals, teams and global organisations to increase performance, productivity, engagement, health and happiness through deeper rest 🌙

Please book a virtual coffee if you'd like to learn more: https://calendly.com/daniel-white-health/ ☕

treasury_media.title: Register for my webinar: "Sleeping for Success: Unlocking Your Organisation’s True Human Potential 💤"

treasury_media.description: Book a complimentary introductory call with Daniel: https://calendly.com/daniel-white-health/sblb-discovery-call?back=1&month=2023-05
treasury_media.title: Let's chat about our sleep training services

profile_positions.description:
Due to my early life experiences struggling with poor sleep and its associated mental and physical health challenges, it was always my wish to launch a non-profit entity that could pursue the development of educational materials and science-led interventions to support the sleep of children, adolescents and young adults. In 2021, the Sleep Better Live Better Foundation was registered with the aim to provide evidence-based education and tools that can support the health and well-being of our community through achieving better sleep. 

The foundation’s main focus is to highlight and address core issues affecting children’s and adolescents’ sleep through the promotion of research-backed education and other interventions that have been scientifically validated as having positive impacts on sleep health, growth, development and overall well-being. It has since developed partnerships with key stakeholders, including the Guernsey Educational Psychology Department and the island's educational institutions, to develop large-scale education and research interventions targetting young people in Guernsey in 2023 and beyond.

For more information about the foundation's projects please visit: https://www.sleepbetterlivebetter.co.uk/pages/foundation
profile_positions.title: Chairman of the Sleep Better Live Better Foundation

profile_positions.description:
At Sleep Better Live Better, we believe that everybody should be able to access practical, research-based advice, information and products that can help to improve the way that we sleep, meaning that we can all get the most out of every day of our waking lives.

We believe there is an enormous pool of untapped human potential that can arise from being well-rested, as science clearly demonstrates that sleep is the most potent inner healing, emotionally balancing and performance-enhancing force that exists.

Despite this knowledge, a study by RAND Europe (2016) demonstrated that 71% of UK adults aren’t getting the required amount of sleep to live their lives in the happiest, healthy and most productive way. It also demonstrated that sleep-deprived employees are costing companies up to six working days in lost productivity per annum, based on a typical 250 working day year. 

Calculated across an entire workforce with approximately 100 employees, this results in the loss of more than 400 working days a year - equivalent to two employees being ‘absent’ almost all of the time.

As an organisation, the knock-on effects of staff being unable to achieve high-quality sleep are significant, and not just in terms of stifled creativity and lowered innovation, performance and productivity. Workplace safety, human error, and staff well-being are also areas of direct impact on business.

At Sleep Better Live Better, we address these issues through the delivery of online sleep training/coaching programmes, combining:

- Consulting expertise
- Interactive training workshops
- An evidence-based, online learning programme
- Professional coaching
- Physical tools and equipment for improving sleep

Our solutions are built not only to protect organisations from the detrimental impacts of sleep deprivation on employees but also to bring out the best in their creativity, performance and productivity.

Book a virtual coffee: https://calendly.com/daniel-white-health/sblb-discovery-call
profile_positions.title: Founder of Sleep Better Live Better

profile_positions.description:
Wellity Global is the recognised and trusted provider of mental health and wellbeing training solutions for some of the world’s most respected organisations including the UK Home Office, the G7 Summit, Police Force, Nokia, Fujitsu and many more.

Through their network of global industry leaders in the field of mental and physical wellbeing, they provide solutions based on prevention, management and recovery of poor health. 

I share my sleep expertise with Wellity's clients through live webinars, workshops and online learning resources.
profile_positions.title: Associate

profile_positions.description:
I coach and mentor a wide range of groups and individuals in the professional industries, from those wishing to optimise their physical and mental performance, to those suffering from a diverse spectrum of health conditions.

I have previously worked with organisations such as Boston Consulting Group (BCG), Healthspan, Bank Julius Baer, Credit Suisse, Deloitte, KPMG, Specsavers, Royal Bank of Scotland (RBS), Royal Bank of Canada (RBC), Collas Crill, First Central Group and many others.

Whilst 1-1 health coaching is no longer my main focus, I do provide occasional services to specific individuals and often transfer these skills to coaching larger groups and organisations globally.

👉🏽 Get my FREE job search resources by visiting: https://bit.ly/gradvance-resources

🌱 Here’s a bit about my journey...

After graduating from university in 2015, I struggled to get a job. As someone from a mixed heritage background, I struggled to find role models and was rejected a lot.

I felt lost during but persisted and 6 months later I got my first job in sales. But honestly, I hated it, and eventually had to quit for my mental health.

So here I was, one year after graduating, with no job and no hope. I used the time to self-reflect and decided to aim for the biggest and best tech/telco companies in the UK.

This time was different. I transformed my mindset, job search approach and networking strategy, choosing quality over quantity. It worked!

I got interviews & job offers from: BT, Vodafone, Sky, Virgin Media and Amazon and landed my dream job on the BT grad scheme. It was one of the happiest days of my life getting that call!

💫 Gradvance was born with the mission to help grads and early careers professionals, especially from underrepresented backgrounds, to land their dream jobs and progress their careers.

I’m proud to say that we’ve helped 300+ people land new jobs/promotions at Google, TikTok, BT, Vodafone, Amazon, EY, Deloitte, Fujitsu, L’Oréal, Johnson & Johnson and more! It was my own personal struggles that drove me to start Gradvance and I love seeing my clients succeed.

Over the last few years I have:

👉🏽 Gained several promotions, new jobs and led teams across BT.
👉🏽 Achieved LinkedIn Top Voice 2023 (Job Search & Careers) and 2022 (Next Gen).
👉🏽 Won multiple awards for marketing and D&I. 
👉🏽 Managed million pound+ budgets, achieving significant growth across multiple industries.
👉🏽 Ran personal brand and career development workshops for businesses and universities.
👉🏽 Appeared on podcasts and have been featured in LinkedIn News, BBC World News and more.

🚀 “Job Search Masterclass” - my online careers course and community is launching soon! DM me “course” to find out more and be added to the waiting list.

With a passion for digital marketing and a knack for PPC ads, I help brands grow their online presence and revenue through effective and scalable paid search strategies. As a Paid Search Strategist at Tier 11, a leading performance marketing agency, I manage, optimize, and scale PPC campaigns across Google and Bing platforms for e-commerce and lead generation clients. I also collaborate with other key team members and create and refine SOPs for team management and workflows.

I have over 5 years of experience in PPC ads, which I taught myself while assisting a friend's SaaS start-up and continued my education through online courses. Our company believes that democracy and civic participation are the foundation of a free and just society. However, we also recognize that the conventional ways of participation have not been able to cater to the needs and aspirations of our diverse citizenry. To address this challenge, we have embarked on a journey to reimagine democracy and civic engagement by providing new platforms, tools, and resources that enable more people to participate in the political and policymaking process.

Our team of experts has been working tirelessly to create innovative solutions that empower citizens, community groups, and policymakers to collaborate and co-create policies that reflect the needs and priorities of their communities. We have also partnered with leading organizations and experts in democracy and civic engagement domains to ensure that our initiative is informed, impactful, and sustainable.

Board members meet periodically to discuss and vote on the affairs of the organization. At a minimum, an annual meeting must occur with all board members present. Additional meetings are likely to take place throughout the year so board members can discuss and make other necessary decisions. Board memberships are not set up to be permanent positions; most organizations have terms set up for board members, which typically fall between two and five years.
The ACLU Campaign for Smart Justice is an unprecedented, multiyear effort to reduce the U.S. jail and prison population by 50% and to combat racial disparities in the criminal justice system.

contact.summary:
I help engineering leaders increase their impact by showing them how to influence, motivate, and inspire all types of people in any situation - professionally and personally

In 2013 at the age of 28, I was promoted to engineering manager of a 5 person team

By 2021, I transformed it into a 40 person industry-leading department - here's how...

I was originally promoted because I was a top performing engineer, but leadership requires a whole different skill set that most engineers are never taught

I was surrounded by bad managers, and saw the negative impact they had on people’s confidence, career, growth, and self-esteem

I didn’t want to be that type of leader - but without any positive role models to learn from, I had to figure out it out on my own

I read countless books and signed up for a few courses on leadership, but the “one size fits all” style of training didn’t work for my logical brain 

The general ideas all made sense, but I struggled to find practical ways to apply the strategies and techniques to real life situations….until I realized this disconnect!

Traditional leadership training programs tell you WHAT to do in specific situations, and assume you’re naturally outgoing and people-oriented - but this doesn’t work for engineers…

We need to understand HOW and WHY something works, before we can absorb, adapt, and apply it in ways that work for us

After ditching the traditional methods, I developed my own leadership framework around understanding human behavior and psychology - so that I could:

✅ Influence without having authority 

✅ Understand and deal with all types of people

✅ Motivate people’s behavior and decision-making

✅ Adapt your communication style to match your audience

✅ Deliver constructive feedback that inspires positive changes

✅ Handle difficult people and emotional conversations

✅ Gain buy-in and win people to your way of thinking

I used this framework to develop an effortless leadership style that was directly aligned with my core values, natural personality, and unique strengths

Today, I use this framework to teach engineers how to develop and utilize these skills to your advantage in every area of your life!



If you are ready to level up your leadership skills:



INCREASE YOUR IMPACT AS AN ENGINEERING LEADER

→ FREE Mini-Masterclass - sign up here! https://lnkd.in/ee8kaQRC




THE LEADERSHIP ACCELERATOR PROGRAM

→ DETAILS COMING SOON



📺 YouTube

For more FREE leadership training tools and advice, sign up for my weekly newsletter

zFull.summary:
I help engineering leaders increase their impact by showing them how to influence, motivate, and inspire all types of people in any situation - professionally and personally

In 2013 at the age of 28, I was promoted to engineering manager of a 5 person team

By 2021, I transformed it into a 40 person industry-leading department - here's how...

I was originally promoted because I was a top performing engineer, but leadership requires a whole different skill set that most engineers are never taught

I was surrounded by bad managers, and saw the negative impact they had on people’s confidence, career, growth, and self-esteem

I didn’t want to be that type of leader - but without any positive role models to learn from, I had to figure out it out on my own

I read countless books and signed up for a few courses on leadership, but the “one size fits all” style of training didn’t work for my logical brain 

The general ideas all made sense, but I struggled to find practical ways to apply the strategies and techniques to real life situations….until I realized this disconnect!

Traditional leadership training programs tell you WHAT to do in specific situations, and assume you’re naturally outgoing and people-oriented - but this doesn’t work for engineers…

We need to understand HOW and WHY something works, before we can absorb, adapt, and apply it in ways that work for us

After ditching the traditional methods, I developed my own leadership framework around understanding human behavior and psychology - so that I could:

✅ Influence without having authority 

✅ Understand and deal with all types of people

✅ Motivate people’s behavior and decision-making

✅ Adapt your communication style to match your audience

✅ Deliver constructive feedback that inspires positive changes

✅ Handle difficult people and emotional conversations

✅ Gain buy-in and win people to your way of thinking

I used this framework to develop an effortless leadership style that was directly aligned with my core values, natural personality, and unique strengths

Today, I use this framework to teach engineers how to develop and utilize these skills to your advantage in every area of your life!



If you are ready to level up your leadership skills:



INCREASE YOUR IMPACT AS AN ENGINEERING LEADER

→ FREE Mini-Masterclass - sign up here! https://lnkd.in/ee8kaQRC




THE LEADERSHIP ACCELERATOR PROGRAM

→ DETAILS COMING SOON



📺 YouTube 

→ SUBSCRIBE 👉 youtube.com/@doughoward  



For more FREE leadership training tools and advice, sign up for my weekly newsletter 

https://lnkd.in/epCW7scq

contact.summary:
At 18, I’ve cofounded a music festival with my three best-friends to bring all the French-high schools alumnus of Tunisia, in the same place twice a year. In 6 years, we’ve brought the most famous DJs in the world, selling more than a thousand tickets per event, and bringing world-class sponsors like Ciroc, Red-Bull, Ford, Ooredoo, Absolut, and others.

 At 20, I’ve founded a legal tech (but without the tech side) to digitalize all the process to settle a company in Tunisia.  In 9 months, with a Facebook page, some interviews, and an automatized Google form to write legal documents (“fill in the blanks”), I’ve opened 90 companies, and helping some of my clients in their marketing strategies.
I’ve participated in the Tunisian “Shark-Tank” TV Show for 3 episodes, and been disqualified in the quarter-finals because the jury said “As a student-entrepreneur, the risk is higher to succeed regarding my pairs.” After that, I've been awarded “Student-Entrepreneur of the year” by the French organization Moovjee (Movement for Young and Student Entrepreneurs). 

At 22, I’ve been CEO & cofounder of a carpooling app for the African market, to make short & long distance trips easier for everyone. 
Split, connects citizen drivers with passengers who could share a common journey, for a pre-defined fee for passengers calculated according to an algorithm. In 7 months, we got 60k users, +300k trips research with 20% of successful matching, for long & short distance rides. 
Just before launching, we raised 400k$ for our Pre Seed Round (during COVID19 worldwide lockdown, when it was the hardest moment to raise).

At 25, I decided to join EF to build my next company, and quit my position as a CEO of Split, because some mistakes that I’ve made in the early days couldn’t be resolved.

profile_positions.description:
Part of a selective community of ambitious future founders, working to build globally impactful companies together.

Entrepreneur First brings together talented individuals from different walks of life to find their ideal co-founder. During the platform, I’ll be ideating and testing partnerships with a number of prospective co-founders, before pitching for funding and potentially launching an innovative startup.

EF companies include Tractable (Computer Vision, currently valued at $1bn as of June 2021), Magic Pony Technology (AI, acquired by Twitter for a reported $150m), Represent (social commerce, acquired by CustomInk), BloomsburyAI (acquired by Facebook), Cleo (fintech), OpenCosmos (space), CloudNC (manufacturing), Transcelestial (satellite communications) and many more.

They’re backed by some of the world's best tech founders and investors, including Reid Hoffman (LinkedIn), Greylock Partners, Founders Fund, Demis Hassabis (Google Deepmind) and Taavet Hinrikus (TransferWise).

profile_positions.title: Strategic Advisor

profile_positions.description:
Split is a carpooling mobile app that changed the lives of people who suffered from the lack of public transportation in Tunisia.

By connecting drivers with available seats on their daily routes with passengers waiting for an affordable and comfortable way to get around, we created an alternative transportation system by simply optimize what already exists.

Indeed, it is the most ecological, economical and social transportation solution we can offer to the African market.

We have raised €400k and broken the record of Pre Seed rounds in Tunisia, we have been elected Startup of the Year 2022 by TotalEnergies Challenge TN and have reached 60,000 downloads in 6 months.

contact.summary:
Garima Pandey is a seasoned Senior Human Resources Professional with a proven track record of making significant contributions to various organizations. 

1. Strategic HR Leadership:
With nearly 2 decade of experience working directly with CEOs as the Head of Human Resources, Garima Pandey excels in aligning HR strategies with the company's vision, mission, and business objectives. Her ability to understand and support the broader business goals ensures that HR initiatives contribute to overall success.

2. Start-up Scaling Expertise:
Garima has successfully scaled start-ups in diverse industries, such as IT Product development, ITES, IT Infrastructure, ISP, and IT staffing. She possesses the expertise to build competitive workforces through succession planning, talent retention strategies, and alignment with business goals, ultimately maximizing the return on human capital investment.

3. Learning and Development Specialist:
With more than 15 years of experience in designing, implementing, and delivering training programs, Garima is adept at enhancing employee skills and productivity. Her data-driven approach and measurable results demonstrate her ability to make a positive impact on employee development.

4. Employee Engagement and Retention:
Garima has a track record of driving employee engagement and retention initiatives. She has designed comprehensive learning and development strategies that have increased engagement by 30% and reduced attrition by 25%. Her focus on creating a passionate and collaborative organizational culture enhances team spirit.

5. Leadership and Coaching Skills:
As a certified coach and NLP Master Practitioner, Garima brings powerful coaching techniques to the table. She has successfully coached leadership teams to break through limitations and unleash their potential. 

6. HR Analytics and Strategy:
Garima's understanding of business dynamics and analytical skills allow her to create competitive compensation structures based on the impact of different business units. 

7. Brand Building and Employer Branding:
Garima has designed and executed employer branding activities through various social media channels. Her efforts in this area contribute to attracting top talent and enhancing the organization's reputation.

8. Performance Improvement and Management:
Garima's expertise in performance management systems has led to improved employee engagement, retention, and productivity. She has successfully implemented performance improvement plans and streamlined processes for optimal outcomes.

As an HR leader, soft skills trainer, NLP coach, and image consultant, I take pride in achieving these significant accomplishments, contributing to EPSoft's success in employee engagement, teamwork, and effective communication. This transformational journey resulted in a 300% rise in productivity for the TAG team, accompanied by only a 30% increase in the department's cost.

• Through strategic partnering with Business Unit Heads, I developed a deep understanding of the business dynamics and provided support in acquiring quality and suitable talent, resulting in a remarkable 45% increase in productivity.

• In talent management, I ensured that employees felt heard and resolved their queries with an objective approach. Additionally, I steered employee engagement activities, fostering team spirit and aligning work with the organization's objectives.

• With expertise in performance management, I conducted thorough data analysis on target versus performance, interpreting performance trends to facilitate team growth and create clear career paths for employees.

• My proficiency in HR analytics and strategy allowed me to understand the business model comprehensively. I analyzed the impact of each business unit on the organization's top line and bottom line, leading to the development of a competitive compensation structure.

My role as an HR leader, soft skills trainer, NLP coach, and image consultant has enabled me to drive positive change within the organization, promoting effective communication, teamwork, and leadership development. By focusing on employee engagement and corporate training, I have contributed to enhancing the overall performance and success of the organization.

profile_positions.description:
Here's how I can help your business:

- Landing page copy: I create engaging, optimized landing page copy that will help you get more clients and build your brand.


- Long-form sales letter: My long-form sales letter will help you capture leads and drive sales by creating a compelling story that resonates with your audience.


- Email sequences: My email sequences will help you grow your email list, nurture leads, and keep them engaged as they move through the sales funnel.


- Video sales letters: My video sales letters are engaging, persuasive, and provide a memorable experience for your customers. This allows them to engage with your brand on an emotional level.


- Launch copies: I'll write launch copy for you to use when launching a new product or service—or even just something new on your website—to ensure that it attracts attention and drives conversions in its first few days online or in print.

contact.summary:
An average of 6 million blogs are published each day.

If your blog is one of them, imagine working all that time writing a blog that doesn't get ranked.

Don't you feel your hard work needs to reach the right people who can benefit from the value you offer?

You provide value that can reduce your target audience's problems, but you are worried about your blogs not getting visibility. 

Compelling, engaging, and SEO-optimised content can rank your website and generate organic traffic, so you can make the visitors to your website stay.

Hi, I'm Gouri! A passionate writer and a storyteller.

I help businesses and brands:
➡️ Create content that attracts, engages, and resonates with the audience.
➡️ Provide value to the readers in exchange for their time.
➡️ Retain existing customers and attract new ones.
➡️ Add creativity and strategic research to keyword optimisation.

Your content quality is guaranteed with my services:
✅ SEO Content Writing
✅ Blog Writing
✅ Article Writing
✅ Creative Writing
✅ LinkedIn Ghostwriting


I believe that hard work surpasses talent. But your hard work needs the right medium to reach people. 

I want to help you bridge the gap between you and your audience through words.

Words are magical, but I experienced their real magic when I joined Toastmasters International in 2019. 

In these 3 years, I wrote and delivered speeches which held the audience captive. I worked on projects and managed teams.

📍Created content by understanding what the audience appreciates. 
📍Written more than 20 speeches on varied subjects (Grab your copy of the collection of my speeches in the featured section.)
📍In 2021, I started my Club's Newsletter and worked as the Editor. 
📍In July 2022, I started as the D126 Newsletter Editor for District 126, Toastmasters International.

This experience showed me that words can create an impact and build an audience when used to their full potential. 

This experience I bring to the table will help me create compelling content that your target audience will love. 

Some of the results I achieved using the power of writing:

✅ 28 blogs (bylines + ghostwritten) are ranking on the 1st SERP of Google.
✅ 17 of them are ranked in the top 5 positions.
✅ 5 blogs have won featured snippets. 

So, are you ready to create an impact one word at a time?

DM me or drop an email at gouridixit22@gmail.com to book a free discovery call.

profile_positions.description:
Starting as a freelance content writer brought me back to my passion, which was buried deep because of my chosen path of Engineering. 

I decided to go for Science after my 10th grade and went astray when I chose engineering as my career. 

It didn't take me long to realise that my happiness lies elsewhere. And started a dilemma of choosing a career that'd truly make me happy.

After completing college, I finally decided to take the path of my heart – writing. 

Yes, writing has been my passion all along. But it got hidden deep when I went astray and decided to go for engineering. 

It was in 2019, when I joined Toastmasters International, that I was called back to my passion for writing. 

Here's what made me change my mind:
- I wrote 20+ speeches. The process of crafting a speech, editing it, and tailoring it to make it relatable to the audience made me truly happy. 
- I started a club newsletter, and the one year I spent as its Editor was the most exciting I ever felt. 
- I was then appointed the Editor of the District Newsletter, District 126. More responsibilities made me even happier. 
- I got to hone my management and organisation skills. It taught me resourcefulness. Interacting with club members daily helped me learn to deal with people and solve their problems. 

These skills now help me interact with my clients and provide them with the best solutions. 

The result was that I started freelancing and got my first internship at a budding healthcare startup. 

The experience boosted my confidence, and I got my first client. 
- I wrote 3 blog posts for their website. 
- Understood the Brand's tone of voice and delivered content that met their expectation.

I decided that writing was what I could do best, and I started my freelance writing career.
profile_positions.title: Freelance Content Writer

profile_positions.description:
Medium is a place where I pen down my ideas about my experiences in everyday life. It's where I practice and experiment with my writing. I like to write on:

- experiences and thoughts I have in daily life.
- Public speaking and speech crafting experiences
- Freelancing and writing
- Philosophy (my favourite topic of discussion)
and more.
profile_positions.title: Writer

profile_positions.description:
As the Newsletter Editor, I work with a team of content creators and designers. 
- I work on ideating the theme and content for every issue. 
- Write and edit articles.
- Manage the team and work with designers.
- Get interviews and bytes from club members.
- Network with members of Toastmasters International and churn out content for every issue.
profile_positions.title: Newsletter Editor

profile_positions.description:
Working as an intern with IIM SKILLS, I am writing articles for leading educational websites like:
- Advisor Uncle
- Vaibhavk
- Course Near You

Three of my articles are ranking on the 1st SERP of Google.

I got to learn and hone my Content writing, blogging, content marketing, article writing, and SEO skills. 

I learned and implemented Search Engine Optimisation for ranking content and learned the nitty-gritty of SEO in blogging.

I also published my first eBook. It's a collection of my best speeches at Toastmasters.
profile_positions.title: Content Writing Intern

profile_positions.description:
- I wrote scripts for YouTube videos and reels. 
- Worked on social media content, landing pages, blogs.
- Worked with the team to brainstorm ideas for content calendar.
profile_positions.title: Content Writing Intern

profile_positions.description:
As the Vice President- Education of my club, I got to hone my management skills. 

I got to work closely with all members of the club. Interacting with them daily and helping them out with their Pathways (education program in Toastmasters International) helped me learn to deal with people and solve their problems. 

This role also equipped me with the skill of resourcefulness.

I got to learn to manage meeting agendas innovatively.
profile_positions.title: Vice President Education
